Wedding Milestone Trio
List.Description:
Another Wedding or Anniversary option offers these three collectible wines

Instead of another table setting, give the happy couple something they can toast to! Our Wedding Milestone Trio, or the 1-3-5 as we like to call it, is a collection of three wines to help couples celebrate some milestone anniversaries - one to toast the first year together, one to commemorate three years, and one to mark year five.

Gift includes a bottle of each:

  • FIRST ANNIVERSARY:
    Iron Horse Wedding Cuvee
    What better bubbly to remember your wedding than with Iron Horse winery's delicious Wedding Cuvee. From a winery known for their sparkling wines, which are often served at the White House, the Wedding Cuvee is delightfully crisp, refreshing and yet complex in its toasty and creamy texture.

  • THIRD ANNIVERSARY:
    Sequana Santa Lucia Highlands Pinot Noir
    This Pinot Noir is a perfect bottle for that three year celebration. Pinot Noir flourishes in the Santa Lucia Highlands, producing ageable wines characterized by flavors of wild cherry and appealing earthiness.

  • FIFTH ANNIVERSARY:
    Justin Cabernet Sauvignon
    One of the best Cabernet Sauvignons in Central California, this Justin wine will be delicious after five years in the cellar. Its layers of red and black fruits, backed by fine tannins, make it a bottle worthy of that five year toast.

Due to the popularity of this gift, wines or vintages sometimes sell out. Should this happen, we will always substitute with the current vintage and wines with equal or greater value.

Vinturi Wine Aerator
List.Description:
Wine which has been allowed to breathe tastes better. As wine breathes, it opens up, and releases its intended aromas and flavors.

The Vinturi Red Wine Aerator delivers aeration in the time it takes to pour a glass. Simply hold Vinturi over a glass and pour wine through. Vinturi draws in and mixes the proper amount of air for the right amount of time, allowing your wine to breathe instantly. The results are a better bouquet, enhanced flavor, and a smoother finish. No-drip stand and filter screen included. Both acrylic aerator and base are dishwasher safe.

Riedel Vinum -Set of 2 Oaked Chardonnay Glasses
List.Description:
Vinum was the first machine-made series of glasses in history based exclusively on the characteristics of grape varietals. Vinum has had a permanent impact on the globe's wine culture. These glasses have proved that the pleasures of consuming wine start with the glass.

Offering a larger volume, the Vinum Oaked Chardonnay glass reveals the intensity and the wine's layers of aroma. The size of the bowl enables the rich bouquet to develop its wonderfully diverse range of aromas, emphasizing the finesse, while minimizing the risk of it becoming over-concentrated.

Recommended for: Chardonnay, Montrachet.
Each glass stands 7 1/2" high and holds 21 1/8 oz. Boxed set of 2.

Wine sold separately.

See other Riedel Vinum sizes and styles

The Vinum series is made from 24% lead crystal.

Attention California residents. Proposition 65 warning:
Consuming foods or beverages that have been kept or served in leaded crystal products or handling products made of leaded crystal will expose you to lead, a chemical known to the State of California to cause birth defects or other reproductive harm.
